caseTitle: Chief Engineer, Gujranwala Electric Power Company (GEPCO), Gujranwala v. Khalid Mehmood and others
tagline: The law of limitation reduces an effect of extinguishment of a right of a party when significant lapses occur without sufficient cause for condonation. Even if the order is considered void, the aggrieved person should approach more cautiously rather than waiting for lapse of limitation.
